title: Tandem Theory Publishes AI and Consumer Marketing Report
statement: Tandem Theory published a marketing trend report called 'Tandem Pulse: How Brands Can Win Consumers with AI' in May 2025.

citations.quote: Tandem Pulse: How Brands Can Win Consumers with AI May 20, 2025 In a world of rising skepticism and AI overload, how can brands stay trusted, chosen, and relevant? Access our new marketing trend report.
